string-array.name: textViewAppInfo_Paragraphs
string-array.item: "This app allows you to give your carrier access to your device's location. The carrier can use this information for any purpose. To give the carrier access:\n\n"
" 1. On the Location setting screen, turn on Use location.\n\n"
" 2. On the "Carrier Location" app screen, tap Allow all the time. (This app requires this level of access to work).\n\n"

"Note: Your carrier can access your device's location when you dial or text an emergency number and for a limited time afterward, even if you turn off the location setting and deny location permission for this app.\n\n"
